sentences.en: He replied with characteristic insouciance: 'So what?'
sentences.cn: 他以一贯的漫不经心回答道：“那又怎样？”

sentences.en: He replied with characteristic insouciance: "So what?"
sentences.cn: 他以一贯的漫不经心回答道：“那又怎样？”

sentences.en: She hid her worries behind an air of insouciance.
sentences.cn: 她掩饰着自己的烦恼，表现得无忧无虑。

sentences.en: What explains this apparent insouciance? It'seems that investors reckon they cannot lose.
sentences.cn: 用什么能够解释这种听而不闻,视而不见 呢 ?看起来投资人认为他们不会输钱.

words.tran_cn: 漫不经心的，漠不关心的；无忧无虑的
无忧无虑；漫不经心；满不在乎

trans.tran_en: a cheerful feeling of not caring or worrying about anything
